title: Ryan Holiday: Candy Crush & Porn – How to Compete (& Hack)for People's Attention Online
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Bestselling author Ryan Holiday talks about why he dropped out of college, how he landed opportunities with Tim Ferris and American Apparel in his early 20s, and the basics of growth hacking and how to compete for attention.
